challenge.title: Introducing Else Statements
challenge.description:
When a condition for an if statement is true, the block of code following it is executed. What about when that condition is false? Normally nothing would happen. With an else statement, an alternate block of code can be executed.

if (num > 10) {
  return "Bigger than 10";
} else {
  return "10 or Less";
}
challenge.instructions: Combine the if statements into a single if/else statement.

tests.text: You should only have one if statement in the editor
testElse(4) should return the string 5 or Smaller
testElse(5) should return the string 5 or Smaller
You should not change the code above or below the specified comments.
